content: It’s too lazy to blame the law which essentially was about allowing blacks and whites to go to school together. However there were failures probably due to racism that did not address all of the issues related to the issue at hand. The law was passed by racist legislators to shut up the public, not to make anything equal. It’s not that the law failed but that it didn’t go far enough. It’s like shooting a rabid bear with a pistol. It might make the bear leave for the moment but it didn’t kill it and it likely pissed it off.
